text: So on that day Gideon was called Jerubbaal, because of the words, “Let Baal take action against him, since he dismantled his altar.”
The two doors were of pine, with carved figures of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers. The doors were overlaid with gold, and the cherubim and the palm trees were also covered with beaten gold.

Meanwhile, Elisha was sitting in his house in conference with the elders. The king had sent one of his courtiers; but before the messenger reached him, Elisha said to the elders: “Do you know that this murderer is sending someone to cut off my head? When the messenger comes, see that you close the door and hold it fast against him. His master's footsteps are echoing behind him.”
son of Mahli, son of Mushi, son of Merari, son of Levi.

Battle of Beth-zechariah. Then Judas marched away from the citadel and moved his camp to Beth-zechariah, opposite the king's camp.

All these things the pagans seek. Your heavenly Father knows that you need them all.

For if you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? Even sinners love those who love them.
